languages.text: [Заглянуть в глаза Соломону] "Я здесь закон, если ты еще не понял. Пока одни боятся сделать шаг, я вершу историю. И сейчас ты подчинишься, ибо моя власть и величие неоспоримы!"

[Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"
languages.original_text: [Заглянуть в глаза Соломону] "Я здесь закон, если ты еще не понял. Пока одни боятся сделать шаг, я вершу историю. И сейчас ты подчинишься, ибо моя власть и величие неоспоримы!"

traits.locale_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you have not yet realised. While some are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and majesty are indisputable!"

[Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

languages.text: [Solomorne in die Augen schauen] "Ich bin das Gesetz, falls Euch das noch nicht klar sein sollte. Während andere zaudern, schreibe ich Geschichte. Und Ihr werdet mir gehorchen, denn meine Macht und Größe stehen außer Frage!"
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne in die Augen schauen] "Ich bin das Gesetz, falls Euch das noch nicht klar sein sollte. Während andere zaudern, schreibe ich Geschichte. Und Ihr werdet mir gehorchen, denn meine Macht und Größe stehen außer Frage!"

languages.text: [Regarder Solomorne droit dans les yeux] « Je suis la loi, au cas où vous ne l'auriez pas encore compris. Tandis que d'autres ont peur de faire des vagues, moi, j'écris l'histoire. Et vous allez m'obéir, car mon pouvoir et ma grandeur sont incontestables ! »
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

traits.locale_text: [Regarder Solomorne droit dans les yeux] « Je suis la loi, au cas où vous ne l'auriez pas encore compris. Tandis que d'autres ont peur de faire des vagues, moi, j'écris l'histoire. Et vous allez m'obéir, car mon pouvoir et ma grandeur sont incontestables ! »

languages.text: [直视索罗蒙的眼睛]“或许你没有意识到：我就是法律。其他人畏首畏尾，而我却创造了历史。你必须服从我的命令，因为我的权力与伟大不容置疑！”
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

traits.locale_text: [直视索罗蒙的眼睛]“或许你没有意识到：我就是法律。其他人畏首畏尾，而我却创造了历史。你必须服从我的命令，因为我的权力与伟大不容置疑！”

languages.text: [Mirar a Solomorne a los ojos] «Yo soy la ley, por si aún no se ha dado cuenta. Mientras que otros tienen miedo de actuar, yo hago historia. ¡Y usted me obedecerá, pues mi poder y mi grandeza son indiscutibles!».
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

traits.locale_text: [Mirar a Solomorne a los ojos] «Yo soy la ley, por si aún no se ha dado cuenta. Mientras que otros tienen miedo de actuar, yo hago historia. ¡Y usted me obedecerá, pues mi poder y mi grandeza son indiscutibles!».

languages.text: [ソロモーンの目をまっすぐ見つめる]「{mf|俺|私}が法だ。まだ気づいていなかったのなら言ってやる。他の者が動けずにいる間に、{mf|俺|私}は歴史を作る。君は{mf|俺|私}に従え。{mf|俺|私}の力と偉大さは誰も否定できないのだから！」
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"

traits.locale_text: [ソロモーンの目をまっすぐ見つめる]「{mf|俺|私}が法だ。まだ気づいていなかったのなら言ってやる。他の者が動けずにいる間に、{mf|俺|私}は歴史を作る。君は{mf|俺|私}に従え。{mf|俺|私}の力と偉大さは誰も否定できないのだから！」

languages.text: [Solomorne'un gözlerinin içine bak] "Henüz fark etmediysen diye söylüyorum, kanun benim. Diğer hamle yapmaktan korkarken ben tarih yazarım. Şimdi bana itaat edeceksin. Gücüm ve büyüklüğüm tartışılmaz!"
languages.original_text: [Look Solomorne straight in the eye] "I am the law, in case you had not yet realised. While others are afraid to make a move, I make history. And you will obey now, for my power and greatness are indisputable!"
